data.eml:eml: First record of the family Schizodactylidae (Orthoptera: Ensifera) from Thailand, with the description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Dawwrueng, Pattarawich, Panitvong, Nonn, Mooltham, Kanin, Meebenjamart, Pongpipat, Jaitrong, Weeyawat (2018): First record of the family Schizodactylidae (Orthoptera: Ensifera) from Thailand, with the description of a new species. Zootaxa 4472 (1), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4472.1.2
